title.en: English for Intermediate Learners. Grammar and Vocabulary Course (100% Web-Based), Level B2.1 > B2.2
title.et: Inglise keel kesktasemele. Grammatika ja sõnavara (100% e-õpe), tase B2.1 > B2.2

description.en: The course is 100% web-based. During the course, students will consolidate their grammar and vocabulary skills by doing various types of interactive exercises, quizzes and tasks as well as taking two tests based on the course materials. The language of instruction is English.
description.et: Kursus on 100% veebipõhine. Kursuse käigus läbivad õpilased iseseisvalt kursuse materjalid, teevad erinevaid interaktiivseid harjutusi ja töid sõnavara ja grammatika kinnistamiseks ning sooritavad kaks kokkuvõtvat testi.

objectives.en: The objective of the course is to develop students' grammar and vocabulary skills at B2 level.
objectives.et: Kursuse eesmärk on arendada õpilaste sõnavara- ja grammatikaoskust B2 tasemel.

learning_outcomes.en: By the end of the course, students will have expanded and consolidated vocabulary, improved their knowledge of grammar, and are able to use the vocabulary and language structures covered during the course. They will have improved their knowledge of the following language structures: reported speech, verb patterns, conditionals, articles and quantifiers, relative clauses.
learning_outcomes.et: Kursuse edukalt lõpetanu on laiendanud ja kinnistanud sõnavara, avardanud teadmisi grammatikast ning oskab õpitut kasutada. Kursuse edukalt lõpetanu tunneb ning oskab B2 tasemel kasutada kursusel läbitud sõnavara ning järgmisi grammatilisi struktuure: relatiivlauseid, tingimuslauseid, kaudset kõnet, artikleid ja hulgasõnu, verbimustreid.

Dear Students,
Be sure to pay attention to the registration cancellation deadline stated in the course outline.
If you have concerns or special needs affecting your studies, please inform the lecturer at the beginning of the semester.
If necessary, contact the University of Tartu counseling centre: https://ut.ee/en/content/psychological-counselling. Requiring special conditions at the end of the semester is not acceptable.

independent_work.et: Doing all the grammar, vocabulary, reading and listening exercises; passing two tests (with at least 61% correct answers); submitting four short written assignments. The instructions for all tasks are shown on the Moodle page. All the course materials and tasks are web-based in Moodle.

grade_preconditions.et:
1) Two tests (with at least 61% correct answers)
2) Four short written assignments and introductory forum post
3) Reading and listening tasks; grammar and vocabulary exercises

grade_evaluation.et: In order to pass the course, all the tasks have to be done, assignments submitted and tests passed within the given time frame.

resources.mandatory_materials: Course materials can be found on the Moodle page.
